entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
